column1: T3 Mechanical - Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Matrix

column5: Managers see team, not individual salaries

column1: Technician: My Tasks card, My Jobs card, My Timesheets link, Dispatch card
Manager: All cards + Team Performance, Job Pipeline, Invoice Queue
Executive: All cards + Financial Summary, Profit/Loss, Cash Flow

column5: Managers cannot view bank info and payouts

column1: Technician: "Edit My Profile", "Upload Document", "Update Contact", "View My Activity"
Manager: + "View Team", "View Team Activity", "Add User (Technician or Manager)"
Executive: + "Add User (All 3 roles)","Edit Employment", "Update Pay", "Assign Roles", "Terminate User"
Technician: "View My Reviews", "Report Incident", "View My Goals"
Manager: + "Create Review", "View Team Reports", "Upload Document", "Set Goals", "Review Incident"
Executive: + "Delete Report", "View All Audits", "Edit Any Review"

column5: Manager sees job cost, not rates

column1: Technician: "New Entry", "Add Photo", "Submit Week", "View My Hours", "Add Note"
Manager: + "Approve", "Reject", "View Team Hours", "Export Payroll", "View Violations", "Weekly Report"
Executive: + "Edit Any Entry", "View All Timesheets", "Clear Violation", "Cost Analysis"
Manager: + "Create Bid", "Edit", "New Version", "Save as Template", "Delete Draft", "Use Template"
Technician: View client name, contact phone, job site address (read-only)
Manager: + "Add Client", "Edit Client", "Add Contact", "Upload Document", "Set Priority", "Add Project"
Manager: "Open Calculator", "Add Line Item", "Add Labor", "Use Preset", "Add Vendor", "Mark Paid", "View Cash Flow"
Executive: + "Edit Cost Rate", "Set Mileage", "Edit Markup", "Override Costs"
Manager: "Preview", "Save to Client", "Export PDF", "Submit for Approval"
Technician: "My Jobs", Filter (Assigned), "Update Progress", "View Details", "Mark Complete"
Manager: + "All Jobs", All Status Filters, "Change Status", "Send to Client", "Mark Invoiced", Pipeline View
Executive: + "Override Status", "Cancel Job", View Financial Details
Technician: "View Overview", "Upload Photo", "Upload Video", "View Log", "Add Note"
Manager: + "View Budget", "Create Invoice", "Send Invoice", "Add Change Order", "View Correspondence", "Upload Document", "Record Payment"
Executive: + "Approve Change Order", "View Profit/Loss", "Edit Any", "Delete Change Order", "Override Budget"
Manager: + "Assign Service", "View All Service History", "Override Checklist"
Technician: "Start PM Inspection", "Upload Unit Photo", "Enter Data", "Next Unit", "Complete PM", "View My PM History"
Manager: + "Schedule PM", "View All PM Reports", "Send Report", "Reschedule", "View PM Calendar"
Technician: "Start Survey", "Add Unit", "Upload Photo", "Enter Data", "Next Unit", "Complete Survey", "View Report"
Manager: + "Assign Survey", "View All Surveys", "Send Report", "View Travel Costs"
Technician: "My Vehicle", "Safety Inspection", "Report Issue", "Upload Photo", "Submit Maintenance", "View History"
Manager: + "All Fleet", "Assign Vehicle", "Approve Maintenance", "View All Inspections", "Overdue Report", "Reassign"
Executive: + "Add Vehicle", "Delete Vehicle", "View Costs", "Edit All", "Fleet Analytics"
Technician: "My Tasks", "Mark Complete", "Add Note", "View Overdue", Filter (Own)
Manager: + "Create Task", "Assign", "Set Priority", "View All", "Team Performance", "Search All", Filter (All)
Manager: + "Create Dispatch", "Select Job", "Assign Technicians", "Set Time", "Add Notes", "View All Schedules", "Queue Delivery"
Technician: "View Inventory", Search, "Confirm Receipt", "View On-Order (My Jobs)"
Manager: + "Add Item", "Edit Item", "Set Reorder Point", "Create PO", "Adjust Quantity", "View All On-Order", "Reorder Alerts"
Manager: "Create Invoice", "Send Invoice", "Record Payment", "Aging Report", "Assign Reminder", "Export"
